0001_00000001_00000011 // 01: RA = 3
0001_00000010_00000111 // 02: RB = 7
0010_00000100_00000001 // 03: RC = RA = 3
0011_00000001_00000111 // 04: RA = RA + 7 = 10
0100_00000010_00000001 // 05: RB = RB + RA = 17

0001_00000001_00001111 // 06: RA = 15
0001_00000010_00000111 // 07: RB = 7
0010_00000100_00000001 // 08: RC = RA = 15
0101_00000001_00000100 // 09: RA = RA - 4 = 11
0110_00000100_00000010 // 10: RC = RC - RB = 8

0001_00000010_00000111 // 11: RB = 7
0001_00000100_01111111 // 12: RC = 127
0111_00000010_00000011 // 13: xx = RB * 3 = 21 (0:21) 
1000_00000010_00000100 // 14: xx = RB * RC = 889 (3:121)

0001_00000010_10010111 // 15: RB = 151
0001_00000100_00001111 // 16: RC = 15
1010_00000010_00000100 // 17: RB = RB / RC = 10
1001_00000100_00000010 // 18: RC = RC / 2 = 7

0001_00000001_01001111 // 19: RA = 79
1011_00000001_00000001 // 20: RA = RA >> 3 = 158
1100_00000001_00000100 // 21: RA = RA << 4 = 9

0001_00000001_11111110 // 22: RA = 254
0011_00000001_00000001 // 23: RA = RA + 1 = 255
0101_00000001_11111111 // 23: RA = RA - 255 = 0
